definition: Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: No wound infection or pulmonary embolism were found. 2 cases got involved with urinary tract infection.
sentences.chinese: 无切口感染及肺栓塞发生，2例出现尿道感染。

sentences.english: Conclusion MRPP with 2D FSPGR without breath-hold is a feasible method to diagnose APE.
sentences.chinese: 结论MR肺灌注成像是诊断肺栓塞的可行方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion CT should be used as the preferred method of diagnosis of pulmonary embolism.
sentences.chinese: 结论CT应作为诊断肺栓塞的首选方法。

sentences.english: Results 9 cases recovered, 1 case died of lung embolism caused by dropped embolus.
sentences.chinese: 结果9例治愈出院，1例死于栓子脱落引起的肺栓塞。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze pulmonary embolism's CT finding and the reason of misdiagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析肺栓塞的CT表现及其误诊原因。

sentences.english: Acute pulmonary embolism models of rabbits were established by injection of autologous blood clots through the right heart catheters.
sentences.chinese: 自体血栓经右心导管注入，制备兔急性肺栓塞模型。

sentences.english: Over a period of several months a 33-year-old man had recurrent pulmonary emboli.
sentences.chinese: 持续数个月的一名33岁男子经常性肺栓塞。

sentences.english: Results There is inadequate attention on the prevention of post-operational acute pulmonary embolism.
sentences.chinese: 结果目前在手术后急性肺栓塞的预防重视不够。

sentences.english: Sitting down for hours on end after work increases the risk of pulmonary embolism. Photograph: Jan Baumann/Getty Images/Stock4B Creative
sentences.chinese: 下班后继续久坐几个小时增加了患肺栓塞的风险。

sentences.english: Deep vein thrombosis (DVT) and pulmonary embolism are common after stroke.
sentences.chinese: 中风后深静脉血栓和肺栓塞很常见。

sentences.english: At least 200, 000 people die each year from blood clots in their lungs.
sentences.chinese: 每年至少有20万人死于肺栓塞。

sentences.english: This is known as pulmonary embolism, and symptoms include chest pain and breathing difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 这被称为肺栓塞，并且症状包括胸痛和呼吸困难。

definition: abbr. for 心肌梗塞[xin1 ji1 geng3 sai1], myocardial infarction/heart attack
atrial fibrillation (abbr. for 心房顫動|心房颤动[xin1 fang2 chan4 dong4])
